moves.6... Qc7 7. O-O: White gets his King to safety.
moves.7... Bd6 8. Bxc6+ bxc6 9. f4 O-O: Black also gets his King to safety.
moves.10. Rf3 Nd7 11. Rh3: White's attack is starting to take shape. Black has to defend well...
moves.12. Qh5: ...this move. Black resigns. If 12... PxQ, 13 R-N3ch K-R1 14 NxKBP mate. By opening the long diagonal, White's fianchettoed Bishop became a deadly threat.
